title: Latvian President and Prime Minister post poetic Christmas messages
summary_full: Latvian President Edgars Rinkēvičs and Prime Minister Evika Siliņa both published their Christmas messages on December 24th.
summary_public: Latvian President Edgars Rinkēvičs and Prime Minister Evika Siliņa both published their Christmas messages on December 24th.
